text: Linda Teresa Sánchez (born January 28, 1969) is an American politician and lawyer. She is a member of the U.S. Representative for since 2003. She is a member of the Democratic Party. ==References== Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from California Category:People from Orange, California Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Lawyers from California
title: Linda Sánchez
